channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ladies, It’s Your Christian Duty To Resist Moral Blackmail About ICE On Instagram

item.title: The American taxpayer spent nearly half a billion dollars deploying federal troops to U.S. cities in 2025, CBO finds
item.description: Trump's federal troop deployment to U.S. cities is costing about $93 million a month, according to the Congressional Budget Office.

item.title: Ilhan Omar attack suspect has criminal history, posted in support of Trump online
